attributes.action: Bring in the British navy to stop illegal boats crossing the English Channel
attributes.additional_details: Bring in the British navy to stop illegal boats crossing the English Channel immediately as national emergency
attributes.background: Bring in the British navy to stop illegal boats crossing the English Channel immediately as national emergency

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition: 

Deploy the Royal Navy to help stop illegal immigrants entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701998
